00052    void setOption(CURLoption option, long parameter)
00053       {
00054       U_TRACE(1, "UCURL::setOption(%p,%p)", option, parameter)
00055 
00056       U_CHECK_MEMORY
00057 
00058       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(easyHandle)
00059 
00060       result = U_SYSCALL(curl_easy_setopt, "%p,%p,%p", easyHandle, option, parameter);
00061 
00062 #  ifdef DEBUG
00063       if (result) U_DUMP("status = %.*S", 512, error())
00064 #  endif
00065 
00066       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(result,CURLE_OK)
00067       }
00068 
00069    void setNoBody()
00070       {
00071       U_TRACE(0, "UCURL::setNoBody()")
00072 
00073       setOption(CURLOPT_NOBODY, 1L);
00074       }

00132    void setProgressFunction(curl_progress_callback func, void* data)
00133       {
00134       U_TRACE(0, "UCURL::setProgressFunction(%p,%p)", func, data)
00135 
00136       if (func)
00137          {
00138          setOption(CURLOPT_PROGRESSFUNCTION, (long)func);
00139          setOption(CURLOPT_PROGRESSDATA,     (long)data);
00140          setOption(CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS,       0L);
00141          }
00142       else
00143          {
00144          setOption(CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS,       1L);
00145          }
00146       }
00147 
00148    void setTimeCondition(bool modified_since, time_t t)
00149       {
00150       U_TRACE(0, "UCURL::setTimeCondition(%b,%ld)", modified_since, t)
00151 
00152       if (modified_since)
00153          {
00154          setOption(CURLOPT_TIMECONDITION, CURL_TIMECOND_IFMODSINCE);
00155          setOption(CURLOPT_TIMEVALUE,     (long)t);
00156          }
00157       else
00158          {
00159          setOption(CURLOPT_TIMECONDITION, CURL_TIMECOND_NONE);
00160          }
00161       }

00165    void setPostMode(const char* postData, uint32_t size)
00166       {
00167       U_TRACE(0, "UCURL::setPostMode(%.*S,%u)", size, postData, size)
00168 
00169       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(postData)
00170 
00171       setOption(CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS,    (long)postData);
00172       setOption(CURLOPT_POSTFIELDSIZE, (long)size);
00173       setOption(CURLOPT_POST,          1L);
00174       }
00175 
00176    void addFormData(const char* key, const char* value)
00177       {
00178       U_TRACE(0, "UCURL::addFormData(%S,%S)", key, value)
00179 
00180       CURLFORMcode res = (CURLFORMcode) U_SYSCALL(curl_formadd, "%p,%p,%d,%S,%d,%S,%d,%d,%d",
00181                               &formPost, &formLast,
00182                               CURLFORM_COPYNAME, key,
00183                               CURLFORM_COPYCONTENTS, value,
00184                               CURLFORM_CONTENTSLENGTH, strlen(value),
00185                               CURLFORM_END);
00186 
00187       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(res,CURL_FORMADD_OK)
00188 
00189       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(formPost)
00190       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(formLast)
00191       }

00195    bool performWait()
00196                 {
00197                 U_TRACE(1, "UCURL::performWait()")
00198 
00199                 U_CHECK_MEMORY
00200 
00201                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(easyHandle)
00202 
00203                 response.setEmpty();
00204 
00205                 result = U_SYSCALL(curl_easy_perform, "%p", easyHandle);
00206 
00207                 infoComplete();
00208 
00209                 U_RETURN(result == CURLE_OK);
00210                 }
00211 
00212    // INFO
00213 
00214    bool getFileTime(time_t& t)
00215       {
00216       U_TRACE(1, "UCURL::getFileTime(%p)", &t)
00217 
00218       U_CHECK_MEMORY
00219 
00220       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(easyHandle)
00221 
00222       long filetime;
00223 
00224       result = U_SYSCALL(curl_easy_getinfo, "%p,%d,%p", easyHandle, CURLINFO_FILETIME, &filetime);
00225 
00226       if (result)
00227          {
00228          U_DUMP("status = %.*S", 512, error())
00229 
00230          U_RETURN(false);
00231          }
00232 
00233       t = (time_t) filetime;
00234 
00235       U_RETURN(true);
00236       }
00237 
00238    // MULTI
00239 
00240    void addHandle()
00241       {
00242       U_TRACE(1, "UCURL::addHandle()", 0)
00243 
00244       U_CHECK_MEMORY
00245 
00246       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(added,false)
00247       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(easyHandle)
00248       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(multiHandle)
00249 
00250       CURLMcode mresult = (CURLMcode) U_SYSCALL(curl_multi_add_handle, "%p,%p", multiHandle, easyHandle);
00251 
00252       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(mresult,CURLM_OK)
00253 
00254       added = true;
00255       }
00256 
00257    void removeHandle()
00258       {
00259       U_TRACE(1, "UCURL::removeHandle()", 0)
00260 
00261       U_CHECK_MEMORY
00262 
00263       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(added,true)
00264       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(easyHandle)
00265       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(multiHandle)
00266 
00267       CURLMcode mresult = (CURLMcode) U_SYSCALL(curl_multi_remove_handle, "%p,%p", multiHandle, easyHandle);
00268 
00269       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(mresult,CURLM_OK)
00270 
00271       added = false;
00272       }
00273 
00274    static int fdset(fd_set& read, fd_set& write)
00275       {
00276       U_TRACE(1, "UCURL::fdset(%p,%p)", &read, &write)
00277 
00278       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(multiHandle)
00279 
00280       fd_set exc;
00281       int max_fd = -1;
00282 
00283       FD_ZERO(&exc);
00284 
00285       CURLMcode mresult = (CURLMcode) U_SYSCALL(curl_multi_fdset, "%p,%p,%p,%p,%p",
00286                                                    multiHandle, &read, &write, &exc, &max_fd);
00287 
00288       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(mresult,CURLM_OK)
00289 
00290       U_RETURN(max_fd);
00291       }
